header.title: CosNotification_AdminPropertiesAdmin

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotification::AdminPropertiesAdmin interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
All objects, which inherit this interface, export functions described in this module.

func.name: get_admin(Object) -> AdminProperties
func.fsummary: Return a list of AdminPropertiesassociated with the target object

desc.p: This operation returns sequence of name-value pairs which encapsulates the current administrative properties of the target object.

func.name: set_admin(Object, AdminProperties) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Update the AdminPropertiesfor the target object

desc.p: As input, this operation accepts a sequence of name-value pairs encapsulating the desired administrative settings for the target object. If it is not possible to set the given properties the exception UnsupportedAdmin will be raised.
